subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Like Bill O’Brien of Penn State, Jim Walden at Iowa State and Dennis Franchione at Alabama took over football programs receiving stiff recruiting limits.
snippet: Like Bill O’Brien of Penn State, Jim Walden at Iowa State and Dennis Franchione at Alabama took over football programs receiving stiff recruiting limits.
